title: E-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Exploring Higher Education Experiences of Students with Disabilities—A Qualitative Research-Based Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of higher education systems and disability human rights
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: One can analyze the higher education experiences of university students with disabilities using qualitative research methodologies (individual interviews, focus groups)
One can propose educational improvement plans—such as diversifying learning designs, enhancing physical environments, and providing emotional support—through a PBL approach
One can incorporate career exploration based on disability awareness and strategies for respecting cultural diversity into project deliverables
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
